title: Listen To Dr. Weil | Weil Podcasts | Andrew Weil, M.D.
author: Susan Bulzoni
description: Dr. Weil Podcasts: Dr. Weil talks about the long and interesting road his life has taken, and his strongly influential role in establishing the field of integrative medicine.
cleaned_text: Integrative Medicine's [ Body Of Wonder ](https://integrativemedicine.arizona.edu/body_of_wonder.html) Podcast 3/27/23 - The School Of Greatness - Prevent Cognitive Decline By Avoiding These Top Foods W/Dr. Andrew Weil EP 1414 02/20/23 - How to Use Foods to Fight Inflammation & Scientific Ways to Spark Your Creativity 12/13/22- Psychedelics Today - Integrative Medicine: Health, Wellness, and Psychedelics 8/16/22 - The Tim Ferris Show, Tim Ferriss - #615: Dr. Andrew Weil 6/14/22 - The Ultimate Health Podcast, Jesse Chappus - How to Naturally Overcome Depression & Anxiety 4/20/22 - The Doctor's Farmacy, Mark Hyman, M.D. - Activating Your Natural Healing Systems 3/16/2022 - The Genius Life, Max Lugavere - The Top Foods to Eat to Reduce Inflammation and Burn Belly Fat 6/21/2021 - [The Darya Rose Show](https://www.daryaroseshow.com/) - [How to know is in alternative medicine](https://www.daryaroseshow.com/DrWeil-On-How-To-Know-What-Is-True-In-Alternative-Medicine/) 6/7/2021 - [Rich [Lewis Howes](https://lewishowes.com/) - [The Habits & Foods to Increase Brain Function, Eliminate Inflammation, & Live Healthy Longer](https://lewishowes.com/podcast/the-habits-foods-to-increase-brain-function-eliminate-inflammation-live-healthy-longer-with-dr-andrew-weil/) 12/11/2020 - [Finding Mastery](https://findingmastery.net/), Dr. Michael
